experience.name: Illinois Office of Undergraduate Research

experience.name: Bretl Research Group
experience.summary: Developed an occlusion-robust deformable linear object tracking pipeline and incorporated multi-object tracking. Assisted in developing deformable object perception capabilities for autonomous robotic caretakers by performing data augmentation on the collected datasets. See the Research tab for more details.

experience.name: Illini VEX Robotics
experience.summary: Created interactive guides in Jupyter Notebook for new member onboarding and collaborated with teams from other institutions to create a knowledge base for competitive robotics.

volunteer.summary: Produced a series of tutorial videos on how to use Autodesk Fusion 360 to design robot mechanisms, as well as tutorial documents on basic robot programming and control algorithms. Held mentoring appointments with current team members to provide guidance on various technical topics.
